detail_desc: Short chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Joggers in soft stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Trousers in a viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slightly deeper neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 9 cm.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with dropped shoulders and short, flared, flounced sleeves.

Blouse in airy crêpe with a small stand-up collar with ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, short-sleeved top in crushed velvet with a small stand-up collar and visible zip at the top.

Microfibre T-shirt bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and no visible seams for better comfort.
Sandals with wide crossover straps and a wide elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and lined drawstring hood. Long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a slightly higher, elasticated, drawstring waist and stripes down the sides.
Dungaree shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with straps that cross at the back. Elastication at the back of the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined at the top.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Straight-style double-breasted jacket in crushed velvet with wide notch lapels and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed legs and hems.
Fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with wide shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam with a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Jacket in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and organic cotton blend with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short sleeves and slits at the front. Unlined.
Wide waist belt with narrow ties that can be wound around the body and fastened at the front. Width 8 cm.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, fitted body in lace with an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline, short raglan sleeves and smocking around the neckline, sleeves and hem..
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar, concealed buttons at the top and a frill-trimmed button band. Decorative gathers at the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and narrow, detachable ties below the bust.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Sandals in soft imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with sewn-on ears.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, mesh-lined side and back pockets, and leg pockets with a concealed zip.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wide, ribbed neckline and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.

prod_name: Petite Jade HW Denim Trash TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sleeveless dress in soft tulle with sequined embroidery at the top and on the skirt, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the back. Lined.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit.

Jacket in a washed cotton weave with a stand-up, zipped collar and concealed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs and a zip down the front, shoulder tabs with a press-stud, elbow patches and adjustable tabs with press-studs at the cuffs. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Concealed drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and decorative bow at the top. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Hat in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs with raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Cropped, fitted top in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves.
Wide shorts in a jacquard weave. High waist with pleats, a zip fly and button and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Sandals in imitation leather with a padded appliqué on the foot strap and a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing lights.
Trainers in glittery imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Soft fleece linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Two-strand metal chain necklace with coin-shaped pendants in hammered metal. Adjustable length 50-58 cm.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim. Short dolman sleeves and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless top in softly draping satin. Double layer at the top with a draped collar.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Jacket in imitation suede with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with adjustable tabs and metal buckles. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft jersey.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Earrings in various sizes and designs. Length 1-5.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and at the crotch. One patterned and one in a solid colour.
Cropped jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in crinkled jersey with frill-trimmed shoulder straps and smocking over the bust. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons down the skirt.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired bra in a silk blend with lined cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow elastication at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Socks in a jacquard-knit cotton blend supplied in a transparent plastic Christmas tree bauble.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with an extended lower section in woven fabric and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt jacket in a felted weave with a collar, concealed fastening down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Large, open chest pockets, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with concealed fasteners at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short shorts in an airy weave with a high paper bag waist that is elasticated at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, side pockets and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners.
